text: Pseudocamponotus is an extinct, monotypic genus of ant. This genus was first described by Carpenter F. M. in 1930. The type species is Pseudocamponotus elkoanus, whose fossil was found in Nevada.https://www.antweb.org/description.do?subfamily=formicinae&genus;=pseudocamponotus&rank;=genus ==Species== *Pseudocamponotus elkoanus ==References== ==Further reading== *Pseudocamponotus - Antwiki Category:Formicinae Category:Monotypic ant genera Category:Fossil ant genera
title: Pseudocamponotus
